name: Elektrosoul
description:
Awake the droid's consciousness.

Challenge the puzzles against the system that wants to stop you from gaining control.

Activate levels of awareness by fighting the timer!

★ Evocative graphics inspired by the avant-garde of cyberpunk
★ Amazing techno soundtrack!
★ Challenge you reasoning and speed reaction
★ Inspired by an Amiga cult game!
★ A different and unforgettable experience!

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/bridge.gif

A fast puzzle game in which you need to activate different types of electrical circuits to direct the energy flow from the source to the droid's neural chip.



Circuits can be deactivated by contrary electrical impulses that you will have to divert or destroy.

Reaction speed is a key aspect of the game, propelling you into a race against time following the rhythm of the wonderful cyberpunk soundtrack.

20 adrenalinic levels + 1 unlockable secret level + 2 additional levels exclusive to Steam!
